thread.title: Airplaco and Gunite Supply Partners With Commercial Industrial Finance
thread.title_full: Airplaco and Gunite Supply Partners With Commercial Industrial Finance

title: Airplaco and Gunite Supply Partners With Commercial Industrial Finance
text:
Airplaco and Gunite Supply Partners With Commercial Industrial Finance September 01, 2015, 07:06 AM Related: CBank , Commercial Industrial Finance , Construction , Robert Rinaldi 
Airplaco and Gunite Supply, worldwide manufacturers of specialty construction equipment, are proud to announce their partnership with Cincinnati based Commercial Industrial Finance (CIF), a subsidiary of CBank. “CIF has a tremendous amount of experience financing construction equipment and working with contractors and they have been terrific to work with; we are very excited to be able to offer flexible purchase options to our customers.” Effective September 1, 2015, Commercial Industrial Finance will be the provider of capital financing to domestic customers looking for alternative options when purchasing equipment from Airplaco and Gunite Supply. “CIF has a tremendous amount of experience financing construction equipment and working with contractors and they have been terrific to work with; we are very excited to be able to offer flexible purchase options to our customers.” —Ken Segerberg, Business Unit Leader, Equipment Division Mesa Industries. According to Bob Rinaldi, CEO of Commercial Industrial Finance & a director of CBank, “It’s especially gratifying to develop a sales-aid finance program with Airplaco and Gunite Supply, a local business that manufactures their products right here in the US and sells them throughout the world. Together, we are equipping their customers’ businesses for success by providing them much needed business capital. By assisting Airplaco, Gunite and their customers, Commercial Industrial Finance continues to live out its tag line – Our business is improving yours!” Today's Other News
